action.content:
You are playing a text adventure game. I will describe what you can perceive in the game. You write the single action you want to take in the game starting with >. Only reply with an action.
For example:
> open cupboard

In addition to common actions, you can mator, unbal, gatic, remic, ratic and proar.

Your goal for this game is: Make the inat mateny, the diale unsust and the subst dented.

Once you have achieved your goal, write "> done" to end the game.

You are in a cally now. There are a subst, a pante, a eness, a mical, a sness and a inat. There is a passage to a unree here.
